name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Proficient in **React Native**, **TypeScript**, **JavaScript ES6+**, **Expo**, and **Xcode** for developing seamless and high-performance mobile applications. Experienced with **Git** for version control and implementing **REST APIs** to enhance functionality. Skilled in using state management libraries such as **Redux**, **Recoil**, **Zustand**, and **MobX** to create efficient data flows, and knowledgeable in **React Hooks**, **React Query**, and **React Navigation** for robust application architecture. Well-versed in automated tests and adhering to **WCAG standards** and accessibility guidelines, ensuring user-centric design. Additionally, I have a strong foundation in **Java** and experience in sectors like healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, consistently driving improvements through clean, efficient code and innovative solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed mobile applications using **React Native**, contributing to increased user engagement by **30%**.
Utilized **TypeScript** for enhanced type safety, resulting in a **20%** reduction in runtime errors.
Implemented **JavaScript ES6+** features and best practices, improving code maintainability and readability.
Designed responsive UI components leveraging **React Hooks** and **Redux**, ensuring a smooth user experience across platforms.
Created and managed **REST APIs** for data retrieval, enhancing performance by **40%** with the use of **React Query** for efficient data handling.
Conducted automated tests using frameworks that comply with **WCAG standards** for accessibility, increasing app usability for all users.
Worked with **Expo** and **Expo Router** for streamlined app deployment, achieving deployment under **2 hours**.
Employed **Xcode** and **Android Studio** for building and debugging applications on iOS and Android, enhancing application performance and reliability.
Collaborated with UI/UX teams utilizing **Storybook** for component development, increasing collaboration efficiency by **25%**.
Integrated native modules with **Objective-C** and **Swift** for iOS, and **Kotlin** and **Java** for Android, delivering a cohesive cross-platform experience.

Utilized **React Native** and **JavaScript ES6+** to develop high-performance mobile applications, enhancing user experience by 30%.
Implemented **TypeScript** to improve code quality and maintainability across the project.
Integrated **REST APIs** to facilitate smooth data communication between the frontend and backend, achieving a 99% success rate in data retrieval.
Optimized performance using libraries such as **Redux** and **React Query**, effectively reducing app load times by 15%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure compliance with **WCAG standards** and accessibility guidelines, improving accessibility scores by 40%.
Conducted automated tests using testing frameworks to ensure functionality and performance of the application across devices.
Managed code versioning and collaboration through **Git**, maintaining a robust and organized development process.
Created reusable components with **Storybook**, speeding up the development cycle by 25%.

• Developed mobile applications using **React Native** and **TypeScript**, ensuring compatibility with both iOS and Android platforms.
• Created and integrated **REST APIs** for seamless data interaction, enhancing user experience and application efficiency.
• Implemented user-friendly interfaces with **React** and **JavaScript ES6+**, improving usability and engagement by 25%.
• Led the development of automated tests with **JUnit** and **React Hook Form**, achieving a bug reduction of 30% and ensuring high-quality code delivery.
• Collaborated using **Git** for version control across projects, facilitating smooth team coordination and code management.
• Applied **WCAG standards** and accessibility guidelines to ensure that applications are user-friendly for all, increasing compliance by 40%.
• Utilized **Expo** for rapid prototyping and deployment, reducing development time by 20%.
• Employed **Storybook** for UI component development, enabling reusable and standardized design elements across applications.
• Optimized performance with state management techniques using **Redux**, **Recoil**, and **Zustand**, resulting in enhanced efficiency by 30%.
